snippet: A refurbished Federal-style SoHo townhouse at 27 Vandam Street, built in 1823 and later home to the choreographer Paul Taylor, is poised to enter the market.
abstract: Four-story Federal-style townhouse at 27 Vandam Street in SoHo, built in 1823 and recently returned to its original state as single-family residence, is about to enter market at $16.3 million.
lead_paragraph: A refurbished Federal-style SoHo townhouse at 27 Vandam Street, built in 1823 and later home to the choreographer Paul Taylor, is poised to enter the market.
